title: Commercial Electric 6 in. White Integrated LED Recessed Downlight with Nightlight Trim (2)
features: Choose Night Light feature and 5 colors of light output options
Night Light emits 2000K soft Amber glow for added ambiance
11-Watt, 670 Lumens, wet rated, lasts 50000 hours continued use
description: Commercial Electric's 6 in. Integrated LED Recessed Downlight with Night Light Trim feature and multiple light output options is the most innovative recessed fixture on the market. No more buying multiple lights deciding which output looks best, no more going back and forth returning to the store and installing again. All of your lighting options are in 1-box. You choose from 5 color temperatures of light output for your space using a toggle switch on the back of the fixture. Switch on the Night Light feature when you prefer a soft Amber hue for your space, activate it by toggling your wall switch. This light emits 670 Lumens of brightness of premium LEDs using only 11-Watt of electricity. It is easy to install and maintenance free with no bulbs to replace. Ideal for kitchen, bedroom, living room, family room, basement and much more
